label: A2B_tI6_139_d_a-001
title: ThH$_{2}$ ($L'2_{b}$) Structure
comments: This structure was given the extended {\em Strukturbericht} label $L'2_{b}$ by (Pearson, 1967).  It did not appear in the original {\em Strukturbericht} volumes.  We had previously followed (Villars, 1991) and (Westbrook, 1995) and gave it the label $L'2$, however this conflicts with the label for the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_tI4_139_a_b-002}{$L'2_{0}$ ``martensite'' structure}, so we will now use the original label.
